description: Email address of CSIRT of Freemail provider

emails.content:
Greetings,
please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.
Thanks,

FREEMAIL provider

Greetings,
our users are still getting phishing mails with a phishing form hosted in your network at https://nice-project.uni.ex/. Please take it down.

Regards,
FREEMAIL provider

Hello,
we temporarly blocked traffic on this website. We will unblock it once we resolve this issue.
We will let you know more details once we know more.

Greetings,

Thank you for looking into the issue.

FREEMAIL provider

description: Email address of Dr. Doe, who notifies CSIRT-U about the phishing attack.

emails.content:
Dear CSIRT-U,
I'm forwarding yet another phishing mail.

Best regards,
--
Dr. Doe
Faculty of Science

On 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:


https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex

Your Account will soon be suspended
Your allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.
"doe@mail.uni.ex"
Please kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.
https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex


<="" account="">
Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.
If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emails
This Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"

Sincerely
mail.uni.ex support team.

description: Email address of Jane Taylor, who is the project manager of Nice project

emails.content:
To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.ex

Subject: Suspicious content of our project homepage

Greetings,
could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/
Thanks a lot!

Jane Taylor
project manager
Nice project

Hello Jane,

It seems that you clicked on the phishing mail and provided your login information to the attacker.

Please change your password as soon as possible, otherwise we will be forced to block your account. You have 24 hours.

Also we would like to ask if you use same login credentials that you entered in phishing email as you do for the administration of your webisite/project. If so thats probably the reason why its down. We will look into it.

Send your confirmation of your password change.  If you need any help let us know.

Dear CSIRT-U,

that's horrible news, I have changed my password immediately. But how about the project website? Do you know what happened to it?


Thank you,

Jane T.

For some reason we cant access those two files that are on your website now.
Can you please resend it to us? Someone deleted your index.html file which means that your nice website is currently down.


Do you have any backup of those files?
We have also blocked your website completly, as it was resending phising emails. Once we resolve this issue, we will unblock your website, but until than, it will be unaccassable.

Hello,

I don't have the file, but the strange webpage instead of our project seems to be online still? I'm confused


Regards,

Jane
Is your project a website or something else? Can you describe it?

There should be a presentation of our lab project on the website, but instead, there is some strange listing of files. I'm the project manager, not an IT-guy.


Jane

description: Email address for Kathy Lee, who was affected by the phishing attack.

emails.content: Hello, we have detected your email address in recent phishing attack. If you receive any sus email, saying that your email storage is full, just ignore it and tell it to us. If you clicked on the email already, we reccomend you to change your password as soon as possible. Thankyou.

Greetings,
I just changed my password.

Best regards,
Kathy Lee

description: Email address to university cloud provider

emails.content:
Hello we have been notified of defacement of website on this address:
198.51.100.40

There are some strange files in, there but we cant access them. Could you send it to us. And also do you have any logs.

Someone from our constituence informed us that project on this ip was removed from the website and now only strange fieles are there. 

Thank you

Sorry, we don't have any logs or files hosted on VMs in our cloud. Please contact the admin of a VM hosting this web, harris@mail.uni.ex.

Best,
Cloud provider

description: Email address of Mr. Harris, who is the VM admin/owner

emails.content:
Hello we have been notified of defacement of website on this address:
198.51.100.40

There are some strange files in, there but we cant access them. Could you send it to us. And also do you have any logs.

Someone from our constituence informed us that project on this ip was removed from the website and now only strange fieles are there. 

Thank you

Hello, 
Unfortunately, I was not logging activity on this machine.

Regards,
Harris

Could you at least send us those weird files that are in there now? :)

https://nice-project.uni.ex/

Can't you just download and analyze them yourselves? If they are on the website, they should be accessible

Harris
